Menu

What Is Watson?

Watson is a cognitive technology that processes information more like a human than a computer—by understanding natural language, generating hypotheses based on evidence and learning as it goes.

Watch the video

WHAT’S HAPPENING WITH WATSON

  • The Watson Mobile Developer Challenge


    Bring your Watson mobile app idea to life. Winners receive mentoring support from IBM and access to the Watson sandbox to build it.

    Submit your proposal by March 31, 2014.

  • Revolutionizing Genomics and Personalized Medicine with IBM Watson


    After a decade of R&D, the IBM Watson™ genomics prototype is planned to be used in a clinical study to fight brain cancer.

    Learn more about this "first-of-its-kind" event
